concept.title: Path reports
concept.shortdesc: Customer path reports in provide visual representations of the paths your customers traveled when interacting with your organization or brand. They also provide key metrics about each path, such as path duration, number of times traveled, average revenue, and number of unique customers.

conbody.p: When you configure a request for a path report, you specify the following criteria to limit the results to the paths that are most relevant to your business goals:

ul.li: Start or end touch point, or both
Number of days to look forward (from a starting touch point) or backward (from an ending touch point)
